abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if any Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, you may draw 2 cards. You can't use more than 1 Minus Charge Poké-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Minun is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If you have Plusle on your Bench, you may move an Energy card attached to Minun to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
